mapper.sql: UNIT_PROJ_ID unitProjId, UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, IS_OWNER isOwner, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, UNIT_TYPE unitType, LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, is_deleted isDeleted, QUAL_LEVEL_ID qualLevelId, CERTINST_ID certinstId, SAFE_LICENCE_NUM safeLicenceNum

distinct (${alias}.UNIT_INFO_ID) unitInfoId, ${alias}.APPLICANT applicant, ${alias}.IDTYPE idtype, ${alias}.IDCARD idcard, ${alias}.CONTACT contact, ${alias}.MOBILE mobile, ${alias}.EMAIL email, ${alias}.APPLICANT_DISTRICT applicantDistrict, ${alias}.APPLICANT_DETAIL_SITE applicantDetailSite, ${alias}.IDREPRESENTATIVE idrepresentative, ${alias}.IDMOBILE idmobile, ${alias}.IDNO idno, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_PRIMARY_UNIT isPrimaryUnit, ${alias}.PARENT_ID parentId, ${alias}.UNIT_INFO_SEQ unitInfoSeq, ${alias}.LOGIN_NAME loginName, ${alias}.UNIT_TYPE unitType, ${alias}.LOGIN_PWD loginPwd, ${alias}.MANAGEMENT_SCOPE managementScope, ${alias}.REGISTERED_CAPITAL registeredCapital, ${alias}.REGISTER_AUTHORITY registerAuthority, ${alias}.UNIT_NATURE unitNature, ${alias}.POSTAL_CODE postalCode, ${alias}.IS_IM_UNIT isImUnit, ${alias}.IMG_URL imgUrl, ${alias}.IS_OWNER_UNIT isOwnerUnit, ${alias}.indu_comm_reg_num induCommRegNum, ${alias}.organizational_code organizationalCode, ${alias}.unified_Social_Credit_Code unifiedSocialCreditCode, ${alias}.taxpayer_Num taxpayerNum, ${alias}.credit_Flag_Num creditFlagNum
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_UNIT_PROJ (UNIT_PROJ_ID, UNIT_INFO_ID, IS_OWNER, PROJ_INFO_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME,UNIT_TYPE, LINKMAN_INFO_ID, is_deleted ,QUAL_LEVEL_ID,CERTINST_ID,SAFE_LICENCE_NUM) values (#{unitProjId}, #{unitInfoId}, #{isOwner}, #{projInfoId}, #{creater}, #{createTime},#{unitType},#{linkmanInfoId}, #{isDeleted},#{qualLevelId},#{certinstId},#{safeLicenceNum})

insert into AEA_UNIT_PROJ (UNIT_PROJ_ID, UNIT_INFO_ID, IS_OWNER, PROJ_INFO_ID, CREATER, CREATE_TIME,UNIT_TYPE, LINKMAN_INFO_ID, is_deleted ) values
(#{aeaUnitProj.unitProjId}, #{aeaUnitProj.unitInfoId}, #{aeaUnitProj.isOwner}, #{aeaUnitProj.projInfoId}, #{aeaUnitProj.creater}, #{aeaUnitProj.createTime}, #{aeaUnitProj.unitType}, #{aeaUnitProj.linkmanInfoId}, #{aeaUnitProj.isDeleted})
mapper.update:
update AEA_UNIT_PROJ
UNIT_PROJ_ID = #{unitProjId},
UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId},
IS_OWNER = #{isOwner},
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType},
LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
QUAL_LEVEL_ID = #{qualLevelId},
CERTINST_ID = #{certinstId},
SAFE_LICENCE_NUM=#{safeLicenceNum}
where UNIT_PROJ_ID = #{unitProjId}
mapper.select:
select
,aup.IS_OWNER isOwner from AEA_UNIT_PROJ aup LEFT JOIN AEA_UNIT_INFO aui on aup.UNIT_INFO_ID=aui.UNIT_INFO_ID WHERE aup.UNIT_PROJ_ID in #{id} and aup.is_deleted='0'
mapper.update: update AEA_UNIT_PROJ set is_deleted='1' where PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId}
